name: predominance
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a situation in which one person or group of people has more importance or power than others: The company has never regained its predominance in the industry. He questions the economic and political predominancy of the northern regions of the country. a predominance of something
a situation in which one type of person or thing within a set is the largest in number: There is a predominance of people with an arts degree on the board of governors.
